cab.content: IjEHkU- Q(This Document is the Property ofHis Britannic Majesty's Government.)Military Secret.721/2 / From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, 5th April 1918. (Received 11.50 p.m.) 4315. Marri situation. Marri Nawab hoped to be able to tendersubmission by 1st or 2nd April, but has not yet been able to collect all liead-men. Punitive operations continue until complete submission through Nawabis made. Bombing of gathering at Kalian by aeroplane on 31st March saidto have had great moral effect.1*****__
